= Constraint Validation <sup>[[Help:Constraints |<img width="19" src="../images/navigation/help_start.png" />]]</sup>=

<br/>
'''Note: ad-hoc constraint validation is an experimental feature. It is an expensive operation on the underlying database.'''

'''Depending on the size of the underlying database this feature might not scale and run into query evaluation timeouts.'''
<br/>

== Triples not conforming to the domain restriction of the predicate ==
{{#widget: TableResult |
query = '
SELECT DISTINCT ?subject ?predicate ?object  WHERE { 
  ?subject ?predicate ?object .
  ?predicate rdfs:domain ?domain . 
  OPTIONAL { ?predicate rdfs:domain ?type  . ?subject rdf:type ?type } . 
  FILTER (!( bound(?type) ))
}'
| asynch = true
}}


== Triples not conforming to the range restriction of the predicate ==
{{#widget: TableResult |
query = '
SELECT DISTINCT ?subject ?predicate ?object  WHERE { 
  ?subject ?predicate ?object .
  ?predicate rdfs:range ?range . 
  OPTIONAL { ?predicate rdfs:range ?type  . ?object rdf:type ?type } . 
  FILTER (!( bound(?type) ))
}' |
asynch = true
}}
